plugin.title: Time Slider Tooltip Plugin
plugin.author: Belgacom Skynet, Francois Massart
plugin.description: This plugin adds a tooltip showing the cursor position on the media timeline... It shows the time as MM:SS.

flashvar.name: marginbottom
flashvar.description: Adjust the vertical position of the tooltip... default is 0.

flashvar.name: labelheight
flashvar.description: Adjust the height of the tooltip's label... default is 17.

flashvar.name: font
flashvar.description: Choose the font family, default value is "Arial".

flashvar.name: fontsize
flashvar.description: Adjust the font size, default value is 10.

flashvar.name: fontcolor
flashvar.description: Change the font color, the default value is black (0x000000).

flashvar.name: fontweight
flashvar.description: The font weight for the Tooltip's label. (normal, bold)

flashvar.name: fontstyle
flashvar.description: The font style for the Tooltip's label. (normal, italic)
